subject: Baseball
Little League World Series
lead_paragraph: Chayton Krauss hit a run-scoring single to right field to give Lewisberry, Pa., a 3-2 victory over Pearland, Tex., for a berth in the championship game against Tokyo.
snippet: Chayton Krauss hit a run-scoring single to right field to give Lewisberry, Pa., a 3-2 victory over Pearland, Tex., for a berth in the championship game against Tokyo.
